text: Variability of the climate on Earth is part of natural cycles that impact the orbit and tilt of the Earth relative to the Sun. Changes in SOLAR output can have significant impacts here, as in the Maunder Minimum output, which caused the Little Ice Age. space.com/earth-sun-relation…
